events.description: Kick off the convention with an exciting opening ceremony. Join us for special guest introductions, cosplay showcases, and surprises!
Join us for an exciting panel discussion on the history and future of comic books.
Meet your favorite comic book artists and get your comics signed.
Show off your amazing cosplay skills and win fantastic prizes!
Enjoy a special screening of the latest superhero blockbuster movie.
Bid on rare and collectible comic books from various eras.
Learn the art of character design from industry experts.
Get up close and personal with your favorite superheroes. Take photos, get autographs, and chat with the stars!
Join bestselling science fiction authors as they discuss their latest works, share insights, and answer your burning questions.
Compete in a thrilling video game tournament. Prizes await the champions, so bring your A-game!
Wrap up the convention with our grand closing ceremony. Reflect on the amazing weekend and get a sneak peek at whatâ€™s to come next year!

hotels.hotelName: Holiday Inn Express & Suites Springfield-Medical District
hotels.hotelDescription: Located in the heart of Springfield, this Holiday Inn Express is within a few blocks from the steps of the convention and within walking distance of the critically acclaimed Krusty Burger.

hotels.hotelAddress: 7010 Old Keene Mill Rd, Springfield, VA 22150
hotels.hotelDescription: Homewood Suites is a block off the main drag and perfect for anybody looking for a bit more quiet and seclusion. Free property wide wi-fi and a rooftop pool are key features to keep in mind.

If distance is your concern the Wyndham in City Center is right across the street from the convention! Easy accessibility, but with the great location comes heavy foot traffic. This hotel is perfect for accessibility and mobility options, but fills up quick -- so book quickly if this fits your bill!

hotels.hotelName: La Quinta Inn & Suites by Wyndham
hotels.hotelDescription: If you're okay with a little bit more of a venture and perhaps the best features to value ratio, La Quinta should be your top contender ikn Springfield. Great price, scenic walk, and lots of off-the-beaten-path shops nearby.

If you're on a budget the Country Inn is your best value in the market. If your primary focus is a bed to sleep in and a warm shower then this no frills location is just right to keep you fresh and engaged at the convention.

comics.title: Amazing Spider-Man #1000
comics.description: An epic milestone issue featuring Spider-Man.
comics.creators: writer: Zeb Wells, artist: John Romita Sr., inker: John Romita Sr., colorist: Stan Goldberg, letterer: Sam Rosen

comics.title: Batman: The Dark Knight Returns #1
comics.description: The iconic story of an older Batman's return.
comics.creators: writer: Frank Miller, artist: Klaus Janson, inker: Klaus Janson, colorist: Lynn Varley, letterer: John Costanza

comics.title: Spawn #400
comics.description: A milestone issue for Todd McFarlane's Spawn.
comics.creators: writer: Todd McFarlane, artist: Todd McFarlane, inker: Todd McFarlane, colorist: Greg Menzie, letterer: Tom Orzechowski

comics.title: Hellboy: The Storm #1
comics.creators: writer: Mike Mignola, artist: Duncan Fegredo, inker: Duncan Fegredo, colorist: Dave Stewart, letterer: Clem Robins
